statement.name: findRandomTracks
statement.sql: SELECT {trackColumns}, COUNT(i.hash) AS imagecount FROM track t LEFT OUTER JOIN image i ON i.hash = t.image_hash WHERE (:sourcePlaylistId IS NULL OR EXISTS (SELECT * FROM link_track_playlist ltp WHERE ltp.track_id = t.id AND ltp.playlist_id = :sourcePlaylistId)) AND (:mediatype IS NULL OR t.mediatype = :mediatype) AND (NOT t.protected OR t.protected = :protected) GROUP BY {groupByTrackColumns} ORDER BY random() LIMIT :maxCount OFFSET 0

statement.name: findLastUpdatedTracks
statement.sql: SELECT {trackColumns}, COUNT(i.hash) AS imagecount FROM track t LEFT OUTER JOIN image i ON i.hash = t.image_hash WHERE :sourcePlaylistId IS NULL OR EXISTS (SELECT * FROM link_track_playlist ltp WHERE ltp.track_id = t.id AND ltp.playlist_id = :sourcePlaylistId) GROUP BY {groupByTrackColumns} ORDER BY ts_updated DESC LIMIT :maxCount OFFSET 0

statement.name: findMostPlayedTracks
statement.sql: SELECT {trackColumns}, COUNT(i.hash) AS imagecount FROM track t LEFT OUTER JOIN image i ON i.hash = t.image_hash WHERE :sourcePlaylistId IS NULL OR EXISTS (SELECT * FROM link_track_playlist ltp WHERE ltp.track_id = t.id AND ltp.playlist_id = :sourcePlaylistId) GROUP BY {groupByTrackColumns} ORDER BY playcount DESC LIMIT :maxCount OFFSET 0

statement.name: findRandomTracksRestricted
statement.sql: SELECT {trackColumns}, COUNT(i.hash) AS imagecount FROM link_track_playlist rltp, track t LEFT OUTER JOIN image i ON i.hash = t.image_hash WHERE (:sourcePlaylistId IS NULL OR EXISTS (SELECT * FROM link_track_playlist ltp WHERE ltp.track_id = t.id AND ltp.playlist_id = :sourcePlaylistId)) AND rltp.playlist_id = :restrictedPlaylistId AND t.id = rltp.track_id AND (:mediatype IS NULL OR t.mediatype = :mediatype) AND (NOT t.protected OR t.protected = :protected) GROUP BY {groupByTrackColumns} ORDER BY random() LIMIT :maxCount OFFSET 0

statement.name: findLastUpdatedTracksRestricted
statement.sql: SELECT {trackColumns}, COUNT(i.hash) AS imagecount FROM tlink_track_playlist rltp, rack t LEFT OUTER JOIN image i ON i.hash = t.image_hash WHERE :sourcePlaylistId IS NULL OR EXISTS (SELECT * FROM link_track_playlist ltp WHERE ltp.track_id = t.id AND ltp.playlist_id = :sourcePlaylistId) AND rltp.playlist_id = :restrictedPlaylistId AND t.id = rltp.track_id GROUP BY {groupByTrackColumns} ORDER BY ts_updated DESC LIMIT :maxCount OFFSET 0

statement.name: findMostPlayedTracksRestricted
statement.sql: SELECT {trackColumns}, COUNT(i.hash) AS imagecount FROM link_track_playlist rltp, track t LEFT OUTER JOIN image i ON i.hash = t.image_hash WHERE :sourcePlaylistId IS NULL OR EXISTS (SELECT * FROM link_track_playlist ltp WHERE ltp.track_id = t.id AND ltp.playlist_id = :sourcePlaylistId) AND rltp.playlist_id = :restrictedPlaylistId AND t.id = rltp.track_id GROUP BY {groupByTrackColumns} ORDER BY playcount DESC LIMIT :maxCount OFFSET 0

statement.name: findAlbumImage
statement.sql: SELECT data AS data FROM image i, track t WHERE t.album = :album AND i.hash = t.image_hash AND i.size = :size LIMIT 1 OFFSET 0

statement.name: nextPlaylistId
statement.sql: SELECT nextval('playlist_id_sequence') AS id FROM system_information

statement.name: nextSearchId
statement.sql: SELECT nextval('search_id_sequence') AS id FROM system_information
